questionList.qu: Apply the transformation `3f(x-3)+4` to the point `(1,1)`. What is the new point?
questionList.solution: Remember, for vertical stretches, we always apply (x, ay) to the point, where a is the vertical stretch. For translations, we add c to the x-coordinate, and d to the y-coordinate, where c and d represent horizontal and vertical translation respectively. This gives us the point (3,7)
